trends: There have been 76 other sightings in Calgary
There were 2 other sightings in Calgary on or around November 12th 2011
Summary: while on hoiliday in aruba i filmed this orb.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was holiday with my wife when early in the am she woke me to ask what a light she had seen in the sky was .I got out of bed (it was still dark)and i observed a light moving quickly in the sky.I got my camera and took a photo.As i changed my camera the sky had changed to daylight and i continued to film the orb flying at great speed in the sky .I zoomed in and out to get a referance has to how far away it was ,on playback when i zommed out you can see the orb light go out and it drop down thropugh the cloud.some of my film would be camera movement but i was steadied up against the door frame .The orb was moving in many ways sometimes slow sometimes fast then at times just stationary changing colour and glowing .It was too fast for a plane and too bright for a star.It was filmed looking across the sea to venuzuela.The next few days were followed by heavy storms .I lost sight after again zooming in and when i zoomed back out it appeared to have gone .
